sentences.english: The tectonic setting is the combination of island arc related to a continent and an active continental margin.
sentences.chinese: 沉積構造背景以大陸島弧爲主，兼有活動陸緣的性質。

sentences.english: Okinawa ocean trough and Ryukyu island arc were formed in late Miocene.
sentences.chinese: 中新世晚期，沖繩海槽和疏球島弧形成。

sentences.english: The porphyry gold deposits and epithermal gold deposits were formed in an arc compressional environment.
sentences.chinese: 斑岩型和淺成低溫熱液型金礦牀形成於島弧擠壓環境。

sentences.english: Its provenance is the Dawazi volcanic island-arc on the west side.
sentences.chinese: 其物源主要來自其西側的大凹子火山島弧。

sentences.english: The epithermal silver deposit and the Kuruko silver deposit are distributed over volcanic arcs and island arcs .
sentences.chinese: 火山弧和島弧控制了淺成低溫熱液型和黑礦型銀礦牀。

sentences.english: Shaerbuer Iron deposit was formed in a partial tension environment of an ancient arc zone.
sentences.chinese: 沙爾布爾鐵礦牀形成於古島弧區內的局部拉張環境。

sentences.english: Sumatra itself is part of an island arc.
sentences.chinese: 蘇門答臘島本身就是島弧的一部分。

sentences.english: Platinum-group element(PGE) data for global arc lavas are very scarce.
sentences.chinese: 全球島弧火山岩的鉑族元素數據非常少。
